programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Modern-day Lothario Lewis is bowled over by flight attendant Megan but his tried-and-tested techniques are nothing new for her. Daniel from Aberystwyth returns for a second date.

programme.desc: (2018) Emotional drama starring Sienna Miller. A woman must raise her grandson after her daughter disappears. With Christina Hendricks and Aaron Paul.

programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Desert Fox
programme.desc: (1951) Drama. James Mason stars in Henry Hathaway's sympathetic portrait of Field Marshal Erwin Rommel in the final years of his life during the Second World War. With Jessica Tandy.

programme.title: Anastasia
programme.desc: (1956) Historical drama. The Oscar-winning Ingrid Bergman stars as an amnesiac refugee who Yul Brynner tries to pass off as the daughter of the murdered Tsar of Russia, Nicholas II.

programme.title: Pool of London
programme.desc: (1951) Classic Ealing thriller filmed in a documentary style, starring Bonar Colleano as a sailor whose smuggling activities lead to him being suspected of murder and going on the run.

programme.title: Rio Grande
programme.desc: (1950) Western. John Wayne plays the commander of a Texan fort at which his ex-wife (Maureen O'Hara) pitches up. Can he win back her love by saving kidnapped children from Apache raiders?

programme.title: Flight of the Phoenix
programme.desc: (2004) Drama. Dennis Quaid stars as the captain of an aircraft downed in the desert. There's no hope of rescue, unless he and the survivors can build another plane from the wreckage.

programme.title: Top Gun: Maverick
programme.desc: (2022) Danger-zone action as Tom Cruise returns to the cockpit after 36 years. He's Maverick. He still feels the need for speed. And there's a near-impossible mission to fly. With Jon Hamm.

programme.title: Io Capitano
programme.desc: (2023) Matteo Garrone's heartfelt, harrowing drama about two Senegalese lads who make a dangerous journey across the Sahara to make their fortune as singers in Europe. English subs.

programme.title: The Guard
programme.desc: (2011) Comedy crime thriller starring Brendan Gleeson and Don Cheadle. A dead body and an FBI agent disrupt a rule-bending policeman's laid-back life on the west coast of Ireland.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: A Lawless Street
programme.desc: (1955) A non-stop romp of a western from director Joseph H Lewis. In the town of Medicine Bend, only Marshal Calem Ware can keep its citizens from falling into complete lawlessness.

programme.title: The Frogmen
programme.desc: (1951) Second World War thriller. Richard Widmark, Dana Andrews and Robert Wagner star as divers with a special underwater demolition team taking the war to the Japanese in the Pacific.

programme.title: Henry VIII and His Six Wives
programme.desc: (1972) Historical drama with Keith Michell as Henry VIII, nobly supported by Donald Pleasance, Charlotte Rampling and Jane Asher. The dying monarch reviews his own life.

programme.title: The Violent Men
programme.desc: (1955) Cold War-influenced western starring Glenn Ford and Edward G Robinson. A smallholder stands alone against the expansionist plans and brutal tactics of a tyrannical rancher.

programme.title: Fatherhood
programme.desc: (2021) Heartfelt fact-based comedy-drama. Kevin Hart stars as a widower who is suddenly sprung into single fatherhood after his wife dies a day after giving birth.
(2023) Sci-fi action adventure starring Adam Driver as a spaceman who crash-lands on a strange planet where giant lizards stalk the darkness... 65 million years ago. Where on Earth is he?

programme.title: Glory
programme.desc: (1989) Matthew Broderick, Denzel Washington and Morgan Freeman star in Edward Zwick's epic, Oscar-winning tribute to the first Black regiment raised in the North during the Civil War.

programme.title: And Then We Danced
programme.desc: (2019) Passionate romantic drama with real-life dancer Levan Gelbakhiani. Two male dancers must keep their relationship a secret in the macho world of Georgian dancing. In Georgian/subs.

programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Wrong Box
programme.desc: (1966) Dark comedy with John Mills, Ralph Richardson and Michael Caine. Two brothers clash over money that their parents left to their last surviving child, with chaotic consequences.

programme.title: 13 Rue Madeleine
programme.desc: (1947) WWII drama. James Cagney stars as the tough US secret agent overseeing a special mission to discover the location of the factory where the Nazis are manufacturing their flying bombs.

programme.title: Bridge of Spies Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Steven Spielberg and stars Tom Hanks and Mark Rylance talk about making their Cold War espionage drama.

programme.title: Barnacle Bill
programme.desc: (1957) The final Ealing comedy stars Alec Guinness as the latest in a long and distinguished line of sailors, but there's a problem: he suffers from seasickness. So why not buy a pier?

programme.title: The 300 Spartans
programme.desc: (1962) Historical drama with Ralph Richardson. A retelling of the stand made at Thermopylae in 480 BC by a small Greek force against invasion by an enormous Persian army.

programme.title: Daddy's Home
programme.desc: (2015) Comedy starring Mark Wahlberg, Will Ferrell and Linda Cardellini. A man's living happily with his wife and stepchildren - until the kids' biological dad swaggers back onto the scene.

programme.title: Stillwater
programme.desc: (2021) Tom McCarthy's crime thriller starring Matt Damon as an all-American, still-waters-run-deep oil worker from Oklahoma who travels to Marseilles to try to get his daughter out of jail.

programme.title: Not Okay
programme.desc: (2022) Darkly comic social media satire. Wannabe influencer Danni Sanders (Zoey Deutsch) creates a fake Insta-life, but her lies spiral out of control in the real world. With Dylan O'Brien.

programme.title: Commando
programme.desc: (1985) Thriller starring Arnold Schwarzenegger. To free his kidnapped daughter, an ex US commando must agree to assassinate a South American president. But he's not as pliant as he seems...

programme.title: What's New, Scooby-Doo?
programme.desc: San Fran Psycho: Animation about a group of teenage sleuths and their cowardly dog. While attending the Grind Games, the gang runs into the ghost of an Alcatraz prisoner.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?
programme.desc: A Run Cycle Through Time!: When Scooby and the gang accept an invitation from famous actor Malcolm McDowell to take a trip through time, they end up in the future!

programme.title: Dinner Date
programme.desc: Niomi: Culinary dating series. Niomi from London chooses three dates from five menus. After the meals are eaten and the dates are over, which lucky guy will join her for seconds?

programme.title: Billie and Greg: The Family Diaries
programme.desc: Reality series. Billie and dad Chatty spend quality time together as he seems to have beaten the booze, and Greg treats Nelly as her 10th birthday approaches.

programme.title: The Only Way is Essex
programme.desc: Will Diags finally find love with Abi? Mario is still on the warpath as he tries to find out who betrayed him. Joey and Sam hold crisis talks.

programme.title: The Real Housewives of Potomac
programme.desc: Hard Launch, Soft Landing: Reality series. The clock is ticking as Karen examines what really caused her car accident, and Jassi hosts an event for her boyfriend Darius.

programme.title: The Real Housewives of New Jersey
programme.desc: Messes and Bridesmaid Dresses: US reality series. The ladies reflect back on their Ireland trip, but Danielle only wants to let Melissa know what tea was spilled.

programme.title: Dinner Date
programme.desc: Jamie: Culinary dating series. Jamie from Sheffield selects three ladies to date based on their menus, but which of the women will impress him the most?

programme.title: Billie and Greg: The Family Diaries
programme.desc: Reality series. Greg gets a job but seems to be out of practice, and Billie and Sue find Chatty in a bad way that leads to a visit to hospital and a worrying call.

programme.desc: Chloe Sims' confidence gets in the way of her becoming Essex's next top business magnate. Meanwhile, best mates Tom and Harry decide to buy a house together.

programme.desc: Hoedown to Showdown: Reality series. Joe and Seema plan a surprise hoedown for Nicole, but Lauren and Paige's bust-up could make for a wild western evening.
